item.title: Fatebringer
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. Fatebringer is a 140 RPM hand cannon, back in a reprised version from the Vault of Glass. In D2, it’s a kinetic (in D1 it was Arc). It drops in the Vault of Glass from Templar or Gatekeeper encounters. Once acquired, it will also drop from either of the two secret chests and can be acquired from the post-Atheon chest for Spoils of Conquest x 20.

item.title: Fatebringer (Timelost)
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. This is the “Timelost” (or “Adept”) version of this weapon, which drops only by completing the Conflux encounter Challenge in Vault of Glass on Master mode. The rolls here are the same as the normal version except with a higher drop chance because the Timelost version comes with double perks in the final two columns. The Adept version comes with static rolls in column 3 (Explosive Payload) and in column 4 (Firefly), both solid perks.

item.title: Vision of Confluence
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. Vision of Confluence is a 180 RPM Precision Frame Scout Rifle. It’s one of three 180 RPMs currently available. It drops in the Vault of Glass from the first three encounters: Conflux, Oracles and the Templar. Once acquired, it will also drop from either of the two secret chests and can be acquired from the post-Atheon chest for Spoils of Conquest x 20.
